message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $13,000.  I believe it offers significant value at this price, especially considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product at a reasonable price. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,750. This offer reflects a fair compromise, I believe.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose an offer of $12,500 for the product.
